Verses: 1 esraa Ippadi Vinnappampanni Arikkaiyittu Azhudhu, Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththukku Munbaaga Thaazha Vizhundhukidakkaiyil, Isravel Purusharum Sthreegalum Pillaigalumaana Magaa Periya Sabai Avanidaththil Vandhu Kooditru; Janangal Migavum Azhudhaargal.

2 appozhudhu Elaamin Puththiraril Oruvanaagiya Yegiyelin Kumaaran Sekkaniyaa Esraavai Nokki: Naangal Dhesaththu Janangalilulla Anniyasthreegalai Serththukondadhinaal, Engal Dhevanukku Virodhamaagap Paavancheydhom; Aagilum Ippozhudhu Indhak Kaariyaththile Innum Isravelukkaaga Nambikkai Undu.

3 ippozhudhum Andha Sthreegalellaaraiyum, Avargalidaththil Pirandhavargalaiyum, En Aandavanudaiya Aalosanaikkum, Namadhu Dhevanudaiya Karpanaikku Nadungugiravargalin Aalosanaikkum Etrapragaaram Agatrippoduvom Endru Nammudaiya Dhevanode Udanpadikkaip Pannakkadavom; Nyaayappramaanaththinpadiye Seyyappaduvadhaaga,
4 ezhundhirum; Indhak Kaariyaththai Nadappikkiradhu Umakku Aduththadhu; Naangalum Ummodekooda Iruppom; Neer Thidankondu Idhai Seyyum Endraan.
5 appozhudhu Esraa Ezhundhirundhu, Aasaariyarilum Leviyarilum Pradhaanamaanavargalum Isravelanaivarum Indha Vaarththaiyinpadi Seyyumpadikku, Avargalai Aanaiyidachchonnaan; Avargal Aanaiyittaargal.

6 adhinpinbu Esraa Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththukku Munnirundhu Ezhundhu, Eliyaasipin Kumaaranaagiya Yoganaanin Araikkul Pravesiththaan; Ange Vandhapodhu, Avan Siraiyiruppilirundhu Vandhavargaludaiya Kutraththinimiththam Appam Pusiyaamalum Thanneer Kudiyaamalum Dhukkiththukkondirundhaan.
7 appozhudhu Siraiyiruppilirundhu Vandhavargal Ellaarum Erusalemile Vandhu Koodavendum Endrum,

8 moondrunaalaikkulle Prabukkal Mooppargaludaiya Aalosanaiyinpadiye Evanaagilum Varaadheponaal, Avanudaiya Porulellaam Japthiseyyappattu, Siraiyiruppilirundhu Vandha Sabaikku Avan Purambaakkappaduvaan Endrum Yoodhaavilum Erusalemilum Vilambarampanninaargal.

9 appadiye Yoodhaa Benyameen Puththiraththaar Ellaarum Moondrunaalaikkul Erusalemile Koodinaargal; Adhu Onbadhaam Maadham Irubadhaan Thedhiyaayirundhadhu; Janangal Ellaarum Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththin Veedhiyile Andhak Kaariyaththinaalum Adaimazhaiyinaalum Nadungikkondirundhaargal.
10 appozhudhu Aasaariyanaagiya Esraa Ezhundhirundhu Avargalai Nokki: Neengal Isravelinmelirukkira Kutraththai Adhigarikkappanna Maru Jaadhiyaana Sthreegalai Vivaagampanninadhinaal Paavancheydheergal.

11 ippozhudhum Neengal Ungal Pidhaakkalin Dhevanaagiya Karththaridaththil Arikkaiyittu, Avarudaiya Piriyaththinpadiye Seydhu, Dhesaththin Janangalaiyum, Marujaadhiyaana Sthreegalaiyum Vittu Vilagungal Endraan.
12 appozhudhu Sabaiyaar Yaavarum Magaa Saththaththode Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Aam, Neer Sonna Vaarththaigalinpadiye Seyyavendiyadhudhaan.

13 aanaalum Janangal Thiralaayirukkiraargal, Idhu Maarikaalamumaayirukkiradhu, Inge Veliyile Nirka Engalaale Koodaadhu; Idhu Orunaal Irandunaal Velaiyalla; Indhak Kaariyaththile Kattalai Meerinavargalaagiya Naangal Anegar.

14 aagaiyaal Idharku Sabaiyengum Engal Prabukkal Visaarippukkaararaaga Vaikkappadavendum Indhak Kaariyaththinimiththam Nammudaiya Dhevanukku Irukkira Ukkirakobam Engalai Vittuth Thirumbumpadi, Engal Pattanangalil Marujaadhiyaana Sthreegalaik Konda Anaivarum Ovvoru Pattanaththin Moopparodum Nyaayaadhipadhigalodum Kuriththakaalangalil Varakkadavargal Endraargal.
15 aasagelin Kumaaran Yonaththaanum, Thikkaavin Kumaaran Yaksiyaavumaaththiram Adhai Visaarikkumpadikku Vaikkappattaargal; Mesullaamum, Sappedhaa Ennum Leviyanum Avargalukku Udhaviyaayirundhaargal.

16 siraiyiruppilirundhu Vandhavargal Indhappragaaram Seydhaargal; Aasaariyanaagiya Esraavum, Thangal Pidhaakkaludaiya Kudumbaththinpadiye Perperaaga Azhaikkappatta Pidhaavamsangalin Thalaivar Anaivarum, Indhak Kaariyaththai Visaarikkumpadi Paththaam Maadham Mudhalthedhiyile Thaniththu Utkaarndhu,
17 anniyajaadhiyaana Sthreegalaikkondavargal Ellaarudaiya Kaariyaththaiyum Mudhalaam Maadham Mudhalthedhiyile Visaariththu Mudiththaargal.

18 aasaariya Puththiraril Marujaadhiyaana Manaivigalaik Kondavargalaagak Kaanappattavargal Yaarendraal: Yodhaakkin Kumaaranaagiya Yesuvaavin Kumaararilum Avan Sagodhararilum, Maaseyaa Eliyesar, Yaareep, Kedhaliyaa Enbavargal.
19 ivargal Thangal Sthreegalaith Thallividuvom Endru Kaiyadiththukkoduththu; Thaangal Kutravaaligalaanapadiyinaal Kutranivaaranapaliyaaga Oru Aattukkadaavai Seluththinaargal.
20 immerin Puththiraril Anaaniyum, Serubadhiyaavum,
21 aareemin Puththiraril Maaseyaa, Eliyaa, Semaayaa, Yegiyel, Usiyaa Enbavargalum;
22 paskoorin Puththiraril Eliyonaai, Maaseyaa Ismavel, Nedhaneyel, Yosabaadh, Elaasaa Enbavargalum;
23 leviyaril Yosabaadh, Simeyi, Kelidhaa Ennum Perumulla Kelaayaa, Peththakeeyaa, Yoodhaa, Eliyesar Enbavargalum;
24 paadagaril Eliyaasibum, Vaasalkaavalaalaril Salloom, Thelem, Oori Enbavargalum;
25 matra Isravelarukkulle Paaroshin Puththiraril Rameeyaa, Yesiyaa, Malkiyaa, Miyaamin, Eleyaasaar, Malkijaa, Penaayaa Enbavargalum;
26 elaamin Puththiraril Maththaniyaa, Sagariyaa, Yegiyel, Apthi, Yerimodh, Eliyaa Enbavargalum;
27 saththuvin Puththiraril Eliyonaai, Eliyaasip, Maththaniyaa, Yerimodh, Saabaadh Asisaa Enbavargalum;
28 pebaayin Puththiraril Yoganaan, Ananiyaa, Saabaayi, Adhlaayi Enbavargalum;
29 paaniyin Puththiraril Mesullaam, Mallook, Adhaayaa, Yaasup, Seyaal, Raamodh Enbavargalum;
30 paagaadhmovaabin Puththiraril Adhnaa, Kelaal, Penaayaa, Maaseyaa, Maththaniyaa, Pesaleyel, Pinnooyi, Manaase Enbavargalum;
31 aareemin Puththiraril Eliyesar, Ishiyaa, Malkiyaa, Semaayaa, Shimiyon,
32 benyameen, Mallook, Semariyaa Enbavargalum;
33 aasoomin Puththiraril Madhnaayi, Maththaththaa, Saabaadh, Elipeledh, Eremaayi, Manaase, Simeyi Enbavargalum;
34 paaniyin Puththiraril Maadhaayi, Amraam, Oovel,
35 penaayaa, Pedhiyaa, Kelloo,
36 vaniyaa, Meraamodh, Eleyaaseep,
37 maththaniyaa, Madhanaai, Yaasaai,
38 paani, Pinnooyi, Simeyi,
39 selemiyaa, Naaththaan, Adhaayaa,
40 maknaadhpaayi, Saasaayi, Saaraayi,
41 asareyel, Selemiyaa, Semariyaa,
42 salloom, Amariyaa, Yosep Enbavargalum;
43 nepovin Puththiraril Eyel, Maththiththiyaa, Saabaadh, Sepinaa, Yadhaai, Yovel, Penaayaa Enbavargalume.
44 ivargal Ellaarum Marujaadhiyaana Sthreegalaik Kondavargal, Ivargalil Silar Kondirundha Sthreegalidaththil Pillaigalaip Petrirundhaargal.
